{"id":926530654,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680429319,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/926530654/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Convert an Array Into a 2D Array With Conditions","memory":"29.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> findMatrix(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>>ans;\n       \n        map<int,int>mp;\n        int rows=-1;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            mp[nums[i]]++;\n        }\n        \n        for(auto x: mp){\n            if(x.second>rows){\n                rows = x.second;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<rows;i++){\n             vector<int>v;\n           for(auto x:mp){\n               if(x.second>=1){\n                   v.push_back(x.first);\n                      mp[x.first]--;\n               }\n              \n           }\n            ans.push_back(v);\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"convert-an-array-into-a-2d-array-with-conditions","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
